attributes.action: Refuse to accept USA Anti-missile bases in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We do not accept the need to be the forward base for the defence of the USA.
It is obvious that the UK will be made the first target for any suitably armed country which the USA chooses to start a war with.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
